page.name: Courses References and Resources
page.intro: This page lists references and resources used throughout the course.
page.content:
This list provides references for background information about course content, and resources for further exploration or application of course concepts and tools. 

You may want to save or print this screen for future use.

Bernoff, J. (2018, April 23). Ten years of the groundswell. Medium. https://medium.com/@jbernoff/ten-years-of-the-groundswell-d3d25ab9de4c
